user_query: foreign [Music] [Music] hello this is Mark Watney astronaut I'm entering this log for the record uh in case I don't make it uh it is oh 6.53 on Sol 19 and I'm alive obviously but I'm guessing that's going to come as a surprise to my crewmates and to NASA best I can figure this length of our primary Communications antenna broke off and tore through my bio monitor and ripped a hole in me as well but the the antenna and the blood really managed to seal the breach in my suit which kept me alive I have no way to contact NASA and even if I could it's going to be four years until a manned mission can reach me and I'm going to have to survive on a habitat designed to last 31 days if the oxygenator breaks I'm going to suffocate if the water reclaimer breaks I'll die of thirst if the hab breaches I'm just going to kind of implode and if by some miracle none of that happens eventually I'm going to run out of food [Music] and sweet and sour chicken right let's do the math our surface Mission here was supposed to last 31 sols for redundancy they sent 68 sols worth of food that's for six people so for just me that's going to last 300 sols which I figure I can stretch to 400 if I ration so I gotta figure out a way to grow three years worth of food here on a planet where nothing grows luckily I'm a botanist Mars will come to fear my botany powers [Music] foreign [Music] [Music] [Music] cubic meter of soil requires 40 liters of water to be farmable so I gotta make a lot more water good thing

entities.entity_description: 마크 와트니라는 우주비행사가 화성에 홀로 남겨져 생존하는 이야기를 다룬 영화이다
마크 와트니는 화성에 홀로 남겨진 우주비행사이자 식물학자로, 31일용 거주지에서 생존하며 3년치 식량을 재배해야 하는 상황에 처한 인물이다
NASA는 마크 와트니와 통신이 두절된 우주 기관으로, 유인 미션이 4년 후에나 도착할 수 있는 상황이다

relationships.relationship_description: 마크 와트니는 이 영화의 주인공으로 화성에서 생존하는 이야기의 중심 인물이다
마크 와트니는 NASA와 통신이 두절되어 연락할 방법이 없는 상태이다
